name: SOCIETY FOR HUMAN AND ORGANIZATIONAL DEVELOPMENT IN HARMONY (SHODH)
briefDescription: Indian non-profit and social development organisation with more than a decade of experience We focus on implementing research based interventions and conducting research & evaluation to create sustainable solutions and lasting impact.Our team comprises of dynamic, multi-sectoral  professionals in research and implementation field having 80+ years of experience at the aggregate level.We are present across the country. Current studies/ intervention programmes on the floor in following locations - Bihar, Delhi, Haryana, Jharkhand, Madhya Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh, Rajasthan and Uttar Pradesh
